name: 10.10 "A Fine French Whine" Online Trivia | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	He was about to take some pills for his headache when she started. His water shook all over the place so he told Sam, "I didn't get any water."

questions.text: Who went on all of Woody and Kelly's dates with them?
questions.explanation:
Henri.

	Woody didn't like Henri because he was always making jokes about stealing Kelly away from Woody. Plus, he wanted to go on a date with just his girlfriend.

questions.text: What did Lilith suggest Frasier try for his headache?
options: Lying down in a dark room
questions.explanation:
Acupuncture.

	Frasier said, "No way, never." Lilith asked why and he said, "Because it'll hurt."

questions.text: When Sam told Henri he wanted to settle down and raise a family what did Henri think?
questions.correct: It was a pick up line.
questions.explanation:
It was a pick up line.

	Sam explained he was serious and was done chasing women. Henri replied, "All right, I won't steal your precious line."

questions.text: What was in the letter that Henri got?
questions.correct: It said his VISA expired and he had to leave the country in two days.
options: It said his VISA expired and he had to leave the country in two days.
It said he was got some woman he hardly knew pregnant.
It said he just won $100,000 in a sweepstakes.
It said that if he didn't leave Woody and Kelly alone he'd be sorry.
questions.explanation:
It said his VISA expired and he had to leave the country in two days.

	Kelly said that the news was terrible. Woody said, "Help me out with the terrible part."

questions.text: Woody asked what kind of a country would kick a guy like Henri out and let him stay. What was his answer?
questions.explanation:
USA! USA!.

	Woody told Kelly he was sorry to see Henri go. However, Kelly got upset because Woody was "making crossies" behind his back. That is he had his fingers crossed so he could tell a lie without it being a lie.

questions.text: What did Woody find after about six months?
questions.explanation:
His wallet.

	He had put it in a cubby hole up in the bar where glasses go. He was happy because he could drive again.

questions.text: Who was going to marry Henri so he could stay in the U.S.?
questions.explanation:
Kelly.

	Woody was totally against this. Kelly said that if Woody was so small minded that "marrying another man makes you take a rude tone of voice, maybe you're not the man I want to marry right after I marry this man."

questions.text: What did the gang bet on?
questions.correct: How many more needles the acupuncturist could put in Frasier before he passed out
options: How long until Frasier started to cry like a baby
How many peanuts Cliff could stuff up his nostrils
How many times Rebecca and Sam would try to make a baby before they finally gave up
questions.explanation:
How many more needles the acupuncturist could put in Frasier before he passed out.

	Lilith said, "Wait a minute that's my husband your talking about." Then she said, "Put me down for 20."

questions.text: What was the truth about Henri?
questions.correct: The letter was a scam so he could take Kelly away from Woody.
options: The letter was real and Henri had to leave the country.
Henri really wanted to go back to France.
He lied to make Woody jealous to see if Woody really loved Kelly.
questions.explanation:
The letter was a scam so he could take Kelly away from Woody.

	Kelly found out before she actually married Henri.  She forgave Henri and Woody and Kelly became engaged.
